title: National Day of Patriotic Devotion, 2026
summary: Proclamation 11005 of January 20, 2026, designates January 20, 2026, as the National Day of Patriotic Devotion. The proclamation highlights the administration's achievements over the past year, including securing the border, rebuilding the economy, and restoring American strength on the world stage. Key accomplishments cited include a 92% decrease in illegal border crossings, a 70% reduction in inflation, and the passage of a "One Big Beautiful Bill" that made tax cuts permanent and included border security measures. The proclamation also emphasizes the restoration of American values, such as equal justice, freedom of speech, and merit over DEI initiatives, and reaffirms the nation's commitment to its founding principles as it celebrates its 250th anniversary.
